name: Python
title: Learn Python Programming Masterclass
description: This Python For Beginners Course Teaches You The Python Language Fast.
author: Parag Agrawal

details.list1: Have a fundamental understanding of the Python programming language.
details.list2: Acquire the pre-requisite Python skills to move into specific branches - Machine Learning, Data Science, etc..
details.list3: Understand how to create your own Python programs.
details.list4: Have the skills and understanding of Python to confidently apply for Python programming jobs.
details.list5: Add the Python Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) skills to your résumé.
details.list6: Learn Python from experienced professional software developers.

name: Java
title: Java Programming Masterclass covering Java 11 & Java 17
description: Learn Java In This Course And Become a Computer Programmer. Obtain valuable Core Java Skills And Java Certification.
author: Satya Nadella

details.list1: Learn the core Java skills needed to apply for Java developer positions.
details.list2: Be able to demonstrate your understanding of Java to future employers.
details.list3: Learn industry 'best practices' in Java software development from a professional Java developer who has worked in the language for 18 years.
details.list4: Obtain proficiency in Java 8 and Java 11.

name: C
title: C Programming For Beginners - Master the C Language
description: C Programming will increase career options. Become a better dev in other languages by learning C.
author: Jack Dorsey

details.list1: Understand the fundamentals of the C Programming Language.
details.list3: Understand variables and the different data types.
details.list4: Understand the core language that most modern languages are based on.
details.list5: Learn one of the most popular, widely used languages in the world.
details.list6: Learn how to write high-quality code.

name: C++
title: Beginning C++ Programming - From Beginner to Beyond
description: Obtain Modern C++ Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and STL skills. C++14 and C++17 covered.
author: Evan Williams

details.list1: Learn to program with one of the most powerful programming languages that exists today, C++.
details.list2: Learn Modern C++ rather than an obsolete version of C++ that most other courses teach.
details.list3: Learn C++ using a proven curriculum that covers more material than most C++ university courses.
details.list4: Includes Quizzes, Live Coding Exercises, Challenge Coding Exercises and Assignments.
details.list5: Learn C++ from an experienced university full professor who has been using and teaching C++ for more than 25 years.

name: Swift
title: iOS & Swift - The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp
description: From Beginner to iOS App Developer with Just One Course! Fully Updated with a Comprehensive Module Dedicated to SwiftUI!
author: Sergey Brin

details.list1: You will create a portfolio of 15 apps to be able apply for junior developer jobs at a technology company.
details.list2: You will learn by doing, where every lesson is incorporated into a real-world app project.
details.list3: Start your own app based business.
details.list4: You will learn Xcode, UIKit and SwiftUI, ARKit, CoreML and CoreData.
details.list5: After the course, you will be able to build any app you want.
details.list6: Become a digital nomad by working as a freelance iOS developer.

name: PHP
title: PHP for Beginners - Become a PHP Master
description: PHP for Beginners: learn everything you need to become a professional PHP developer with practical exercises & projects.
author: Nicole Lapin

details.list1: You will learn to create a (CMS) Content Management System like WordPress, Drupal or Joomla.
details.list3: You will learn how to launch your application online.
details.list4: How to use AJAX to submit data to the server without refreshing the page.
details.list5: You will learn to create clean URL's and remove the .php from files
details.list6: You will learn how to use Databases.
details.list7: There is so much more and my hands are just tired of typing :).
